content.label: This app freely offers what multiple paid apps don’t. It offers you quick access to your basic guide or self-administered (through a beginning and ending bell) meditation of selected length, as well as playlists and other resources for specific meditations (e.g. sleep or stress reduction). I love this app and have recommended it to many people. Thank you for helping me so profoundly!
Great meditation app that really makes it easy to start. Would recommend.

This meditation app is nothing short of a positive and powerful life changer. It offers ways to help heal yourself in a world of stress and turmoil. It helps you to understand why you may feel anxiety/depression in your daily living and through meditation offers ways to address these and bring back hope and meaning to life. This isn’t just a small set of meditations to try but a whole range of ongoing teachings and challenges. The fact that the app is totally free is testament to the dedication, belief and hard work of a few volunteers in trying to bring a natural way of helping all of us to help ourselves develop happiness, compassion and purpose in everything we experience every day.

So much to like. Love the different choices and how you can build up your practice to suit you. Being able to choose a different person/ voice to listen too is great. It’s not only simple to use but simple to understand so will suit everyone, so here comes the but …. It has become increasingly difficult to get onto. Loading is a big problem. I have tried many times over four days but only managed to get on twice. A meditation app really shouldn’t leave you frustrated.

Has everything you need. It teaches meditations, mindfulness, simple timers, sleep meditations and stories, it’s great! There is absolutely no need to buy any plan from another app. This app is run by volunteers and that’s what makes it such a good deal and such a great app. Very grateful for the developers.

Medito is an amazing and 100% to use app. The mediation sessions are easy to get into and you get guided by the narrator very well. There are even courses included to improve your meditation experience.
my life was a complete train-reck before i knew the art and benifits of Meditation. Thank you for changing my life.
A free app with helpful guidance from dedicated people. Thumb up!

title.label: Best meditation app on the store.

content.label: Perfect for anyone who wants to get into meditation as it guides you through the courses for free which are provided in the app.

title.label: Amazing app - some annoying bugs could be fixed

content.label: It’s a great app with lots of variations of meditation. Would recommend to anyone especially since it’s free, however there are some bugs that make the app unusable aside from downloaded material. If these minor bugs could be fixed then I’m sure it’s 5 star worthy.

Honestly I have found medito incredible. Before it I wasn’t really into the whole ‘meditation’ thing but my friend recommended it to me and it has been brilliant. I am yet to find a fault and meditating is now something I do and enjoy doing daily.
Thank you very much medito staff _uD83D__uDE4F__uD83D__uDE4F_

I heard about meditation about a year ago, but always struggled to keep a consistent habit and didn’t really understand meditation and mindfulness. I thought if I had thoughts while meditating , I must be meditating wrong or I was just bad at meditation. Since I downloaded Medito 2 weeks ago, I have meditated every day. I also found it useful for the wide range of sessions from sleep to mindfulness to grief meditation and the daily meditation provides you with something new every day. I found it extremely useful to be able to do a short session of 3 minutes to help build up my meditation practice and the beginner courses have been very informative and relaxing as well as helping to grasp the basics of meditation. However, occasionally the servers go down so I would recommend downloading some sessions and turn your phone onto airplane mode to see your downloaded sessions of the servers are down .

I’m going to give this beautiful app five stars, because it truly deserves it. It is free and has really helped my sleep. And the app is free so you can obviously not expect perfection. Every now and then the app has just stopped working for me, but it was fine the next day. Sometimes the ‘background sounds’ don’t stop and just okay throughout the night after my meditation has finished. Over all though this app really has changed my life and I am so grateful for you Medito Xx

title.label: One thing I wish I did more

content.label: I want to start meditating more because I feel so calm after it, no stress about messing up or what’s to come, I’m just present.

title.label: ACTUALLY THE BEST MEDITATION APP CUZ ITS FREE AND NO ADS

content.label: As someone nee to meditating it was tough finding good apps to help in the process but this one has good ui and is completely free i wish i could donate money cuz this jus way too good
App is amazing, but sometimes bugs occur. Lost my streak due to app errors which lasted days and manually implementing it isn’t that same.

this app is completely free and despite this it does not lack in quality. although the servers fail at times this is understandable consider it’s non profit. i would recommend this app to anyone who wants to get into meditation
Brilliant app! Thank you so much ❤️
Great app. The only meditation app that has ever worked for me. Has been buggy lately but it’s back up now. It’s a great app. Definitely recommend!

title.label: One of the best apps on my phone

content.label: I never had written a review for any app before, but I think Medito deserves some appreciation. I have noticed my well-being improve from meditating consistently and using the different packs available to further my meditation practice. Medito has allowed me to learn skills that will aid me for the rest of my life. Thank you for this brilliant app, much love.
Best meditation app out there _uD83D__uDC4D__uD83C__uDFFC__uD83D__uDC4D__uD83C__uDFFC_

title.label: Helped me start my meditation journey

content.label: I’ve know about meditation for years and have always wanted to get involved. However the fact that every other app out there is paid I didn’t want to commit as I might not have liked it. With medito I started my journey over 2 months ago I’ve decreased my anxiety and depression feelings by a mile. And now I am preaching to everyone about meditation. As a young guy struggling with many addictions medito has helped me cut a lot of them out and I’m going to cut the last one out now too it’s a slow process but worth it. Highly recommend medito!
Been fix thank you

I don’t usually leave reviews, but medito is the app that made me to start something that I thought would be too overwhelming to get into. I didn’t know what to actually do while meditating, but their guidance has helped me a lot.

This app is perfect! It’s completely free as it’s a non-profit. There are loading issues frequently, however, this is due to the amount of people trying to get onto the app and they only have volunteers to fix the problem rather than employees . Although, they will notify you when issues occur, so you don’t think your phone is broken _uD83D__uDE02_. Overall, it’s a perfect app. It has many courses which are perfect for people starting meditation like I used to be as it teaches you everything you need to know and you’ll pick up the skill very quickly.
It’s a great app made by great people. Would highly recommend!

Thank you for providing this excellent, free app. There have been some recent loading issues but these have been addressed promptly and are definitely the exception rather than usual experience. I have been using the app for regularly for more than a year and can always find something to suit my needs.

title.label: Best meditation app with no annoying subscriptions!

content.label: Amazing

Thank you for fixing that problem with loading the screen, I’ve changed my review to 5 stars because I appreciate your objective of bringing meditation to the masses and making it free for everyone. Thank you for creating the Medito app, have a nice life.
Best part about this app is that there are no premium features to unlock or buy and fully free.

I love this app and recommend it to anyone looking to get started on meditation. It’s great that it’s available 100% for free and I’m very grateful to those who’ve developed it and continue to work on it and make it better.

This app is a life changer, with high quality meditation for every situation and lessons to help beginners to get started I can’t recommend it enough. Although it has issues here and there they are always fixed and you can’t blame them as they are totally free and are funded by donations.

I love this app. It’s useful and free!
They’ve had some loading issues in jan 2023 and I guess that’s what happens when tens of thousands of people take up meditating as a new year’s resolution and turn to a comprehensive free app. So I couldn’t load this one day and went to YouTube for a guided meditation instead
Let me tell you JUST show annoying that was. Saccharine, sickly sweet, annoying voice, random interjections when the voice SAID they were going to leave me to meditate.
I am so so relieved that the app is back today and I can go back to my regular calm sensible person and I can progress through again. I really appreciate how hard these folks are working to provide something free and fix the problems at speed.
Consider donating to them if you want things fixed faster :)

Meditation has vastly improved my mental state, emotional and spiritual. the only problem i have with this app is the long loading times, apart from that, the free meditation this app provides is honestly great and getting into the habit has been a positive change in my life
Very good but app can play up a bit
The app is showing a blank screen.
I got recommended this app and decided to try it. When I open the app I get met with a gray screen with “ home” and “packs” I can’t interact with anything…

I have an iPhone 11. Quite often I open the app to meditate and the whole app is just bugged, the whole app is just empty with no options to press. Deleting and re installing doesn’t fix the issue either. Apart from that I like the app and it helps me to meditate, I hope they fix it eventually.

I have used the app before and its very good but suddenly now whenever i open the app nothing loads and i have only three buttons on my screen, the home , packs , and the three dots in the right corner i need help and i really want to meditate

I have an iPhone 14 Pro Max, downloaded, nothing, reinstalled, nothing, turned phone on and off, nothing, switched from wifi to data, nothing.
My app is just stuck saying ‘good afternoon’ none of the buttons work or load.
I’ve used it before, I had a 82day streak and today the app is just a blank screen
Such a shame, was really enjoying the app, but no matter how many times I delete and reinstall, there is a blank screen

Usually the most amazing app, use it very frequently and find it to be helpful with anxiety and calming down . However, the app seems to have glitched, I open it an it shows a grey screen saying good eveing and a dark grey saying packs - nothing is showing up on the actual screen in terms of mediation and for an app that’s supposed to be calming I find this issue very frustrating. Tried uninstalling and reinstalling and stil nothing.
Very unreliable which is a shame because it’s a great app when it actually works properly
App is stuck on loading screen when you start the app.
Thanks to the team that created this and make it free

I have never before written a review on the apple store for an app but i truly believe more people should know about this app.
This app brings a free, high quality service to the app store, with its different guides and even narrators of which you can choose.
I have been using this app for a while now and it has really helped me to calm me down and set off on a good start.
I really do reccomend
Wonderful app. Especially Wills voice making me almost fall asleep. Great app, simple and amazing for your mental health

title.label: Nothing loads, blank screens n spooling

content.label: Really disappointed. All geared up to meditate last two mornings and none of the sessions will open. I’ve tried opening ‘learning to sit’ and ‘mindfulness’ sessions. Today it took 5 minutes to open. It is not my internet. Time is precious, especially first thing in morning. Also, it’s not great for the mind to be having troubles with an app for mindfulness. Otherwise this would be 5 stars
Nice and free
Short and sweet, no complications. Just meditations.
